definitions.definition: To change the form or structure of.
To tailor clothes to make them fit.
To castrate, neuter or spay (a dog or other animal).
To affect mentally, as by psychotropic drugs or illness.

definitions.example: {{quote-book|en|author=George Fox|year=1654|title=epistle LXXVI|passage=And stand steadfast in the unchangeable life and seed of God, which was before changings and alterings were; and which will remain when they all are gone.
